name: es-fun
description: ## Set up ElasticSearch 6.8.1 * Directions: https://www.elastic.co/blog/getting-started-with-elasticsearch-security * Install Java 8 Runtime: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/javase8u211-later-archive-downloads.html * Download and install Elasticsearch 6.8.5: `curl -L -O https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-6.8.5.tar.gz`   * NOTE: this link https://www.elastic.co/downloads/past-releases/elasticsearch-6-3-1 will get 6.3.1 but it has a catastrophic error that makes it unusable with Java 8. Recommend you get 6.8.5 as noted above * edit elasticsearch.yml     - set port=9210 * edit .bashrc     - #export ES_HOME=~/elasticsearch-7.13.0     - #export ES_HOME=~/elasticsearch-6.3.1     - export ES_HOME=~/elasticsearch-6.8.5     - export JAVA_HOME=/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.8.0_281.jdk/Contents/Home     - export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:${ES_HOME}/bin:$PATH * run `elasticsearch`
